items.name: spaghetti
items.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan, Pecorino (if using), and black pepper. Set aside.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Cook pancetta until crispy, then add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.
Lower heat and add spaghetti to the pan with pancetta. Toss to combine.
Remove the pan from heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and toss quickly to coat the pasta. Add reserved pasta water to create a creamy consistency.
Taste and adjust seasoning. Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

items.name: chicken
items.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Combine all marinade ingredients in a bowl. Add chicken and mix well. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Cook the marinated chicken on a grill, grill pan, or oven broiler until charred and cooked through. Set aside.
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat. Sauté onions until golden brown. Add garlic and ginger, cooking for another minute.
Stir in cumin, paprika, garam masala, and turmeric. Cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Lower the heat and stir in heavy cream. Add the cooked chicken and simmer for 10–15 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro. Serve hot with naan or steamed basmati rice.
